name: LD52. Harvest Er
description:
You drive a harvester. It's like a unit from a good old-fashioned RTS game.

The game is extremely simple and grind-inspired, so just look at it for two minutes and you'll get the idea.

You can find harvester upgrades on the map or get them if you fill the Base Building with resources.

Controls 
Arrows: left, right - rotate; up,down - forward/backward move
Keyboard Z (hold) - gathering
F1 or Tab - show help

Special for Ludum Dare 52. Harvest. 09.01.2023

Ludum Link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/harvest-er
